title: Dental mesenchymal stem cells
snippet:
Mammalian teeth harbour mesenchymal stem cells (MSCs), which contribute to tooth 
growth and repair. These dental MSCs possess many in vitro features of bone marrow-derived 
MSCs, including clonogenicity, expression of certain markers, and following stimulation, …
